participant_1.background:
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
I have always been close to my parents.
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I've been working at my current job for a year.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.

participant_2.background:
My stamp collection was stolen when my house was broken into.
i ca swim very fast.
i work part time.
I wake up early, meditate, and then have a healthy breakfast before starting my day.
i love to go hiking.

content.text: Hi! How has your day been?
It has been good! I woke up early, meditated, and went for a hike.
That sounds like a good way to start the day. I love hiking, but I don't get to do it as often as I would like.
It is my favorite way to spend a day. I love being outdoors and getting some exercise.
Yes, I have two dogs. They are my best friends.
I love dogs! I wish I could have one, but I live in an apartment and don't have enough space.
That's too bad. Dogs are great companions.
What do you do for work?
I work part-time as a personal trainer. I also do some freelance writing.
That's interesting. I've always been curious about personal training.
It's a lot of fun. I get to help people reach their fitness goals.
That's great. I'm sure it's very rewarding.
It is. I love helping people.
Sounds like you have a great life.
I do. I'm very grateful for everything I have.
I'm glad to hear that. It's always nice to meet someone who is happy with their life.
Thank you. It's nice to meet you too
